actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that progressive muscular atrophy developing a 10 percent or more degree of disability within 7 years after separation from active service during a period of war shall be presumed to be service connected.

summary.text: Provides, for purposes of awarding veterans' wartime disability compensation, that progressive muscular atrophy developing a ten percent or more degree of disability within seven years after separation from active service during a period of war shall be presumed to be service connected.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that progressive muscular atrophy developing a 10 percent or more degree of disability within 7 years after separation from active service during a period of war shall be presumed to be service connected.
